Rahul is a Wu Tsai postdoctoral fellow at Yale University. 
He received his PhD in Machine Learning under the mentorship of Yongxin Chen from Georgia Institute of Technology. 
His research interests are in the areas of signal processing, graph neural networks, and machine learning applications in bioinformatics and neuroscience. 
He enjoys hiking, camping, and exploring nature and is also an AC Milan fan.
